title: What Does the Pregnant Man Emoji Mean? ğŸ«ƒ

steps.title: The ğŸ«ƒ(pregnant man emoji) represents pregnant trans and non-binary people.
steps.content: The ğŸ«ƒ(pregnant man emoji) represents pregnant trans and non-binary people. Individuals who identify as transgender (a different gender identity than what they were born as) or non-binary (a gender identity outside of the male/female gender binary) are capable of becoming pregnant, though they donâ€™t necessarily identify with the traditional pregnant woman emoji. The pregnant man emoji gives members of the trans and non-binary community more freedom to digitally express themselves during their pregnancy journey. [1] X Research source Upon its release, the emoji was met with mixed reviews from different communities. In general, Unicode (the non-profit organization that manages emojis on a widespread level) supports the use of gender-neutral emojis as a means of providing emojis for people of all backgrounds (not just non-binary and trans individuals). Default emojis with bright yellow skin rather than a distinct skin tone or gender characteristics are good examples of this. [2] X Research source

steps.title: The pregnant man emoji can be used to represent a "food baby."
steps.content: The pregnant man emoji can be used to represent a "food baby." You know that super-full feeling you get after enjoying a really filling meal (known to some as a "food baby")? Pregnant emojis of all varieties are great ways to showcase that experience. [3] X Research source â€œUgh, why did I eat 20 McNuggets in one sittingâ€¦ğŸ«ƒâ€ â€œThanksgiving was great!ğŸ¦ƒğŸ«ƒâ€

steps.title: Use the pregnant man emoji to discuss your pregnancy.
steps.content: Use the pregnant man emoji to discuss your pregnancy. This is a great option for pregnant trans or non-binary individuals who identify with the masculine presentation of this emoji. Whether youâ€™re texting a friend or posting on social media, use this emoji to add a little visual emphasis to your content. [4] X Research source â€œI think itâ€™s safe to say Iâ€™m in the second trimesterâ€¦ğŸ«ƒâ€ â€œIâ€™m officially done with this pregnancy LOL. ğŸ«ƒ Is it April yet?!â€

steps.title: Discuss a big meal you recently ate with the pregnant man emoji.
steps.content: Discuss a big meal you recently ate with the pregnant man emoji. Just get back from a buffet or a big family dinner? Share how full you are in a text message or social post, using the pregnant man emoji to really drive your point home.
